Class SimulationThread

  • java.lang.Object

      • reuze.lc_ThreadCancelable

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SimulationThread
extends lc_ThreadCancelable
    Background thread, which is used for simulation.

    Ruediger Lunde
